"SIM Simulator by TheSim aims to help you pass your driving license test. This Android application is a subset of our system. The full system is currently under active development. 

In Android SIM Simulator, you could test your knowledge about traffic and driving in general. Choose the correct answer on each question and let us evaluate your performance in the driving license theory test. 

The main menu can be accessed by clicking the logo in the main page or by swiping right from the left edge of your phone."
